response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its importance, I understand that you might also see its worth at $800,000. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose to offer it to you at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and my asking price. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
